raw_body: FERNANDO – REV. PREMASIRI – (Methodist Church of Sri Lanka). Called to rest. Beloved husband of late Indrani,​ much loved father of Pragathi and Priyadarshani (Dubai),​ Harini and Ramesh (TCI Group),​ Devan and Nelumi (UK). Remains lie at 232/​5,​ Uyana Road,​ Lunawa,​ Moratuwa on Monday,​ 18th December from 5:00 p.m. onwards. Service at the residence to take place on Tuesday,​ 19th December at 10:15 a.m. Cortege leaves residence at 10.45 a.m. for service at Methodist Church,​ Moratumulla at 11.00 am. Thereafter,​ burial at Church Cemetery.083610
